fingerprint.description: Cisco switch or router - user access variant
Cisco switch or router - password not set variant

fingerprint.pattern: ^(TD-\w+) [\d.]+ DSL Modem Router(?:\r|\n)+Authorization failed after trying \d+ times!!!\.(?:\r|\n)+Please login after \d+ seconds!\s*$

fingerprint.description: Asus Wireless Access Point/Router - RT-AC prefix
Asus Wireless Access Point/Router - AC prefix
Nokia Service Access Switch running TiMOS

fingerprint.pattern: ^Welcome to the Windows CE Telnet Service on (WEBBOX[\w.-]+)(?:\r|\n)+login:\s*$
^Welcome to the Windows CE Telnet Service on ([\w.-]+)(?:\r|\n)+login:\s*$

fingerprint.description: HP switch blocking connection using network ACL

fingerprint.pattern:
^(?:|
)*Welcome Visiting Huawei Home Gateway

fingerprint.description: Huawei HG series Home Gateway routers
Cisco router - Cisco Configuration Pro variant

fingerprint.pattern: ^(BCM\d+) Broadband Router\r\nTelnet is Disabled in WAN Side$
fingerprint.description: OEM'd Broadcom Router - telnet disabled on WAN side

fingerprint.pattern: ^(?m)(BCM\d+) Broadband Router\r\n.*Please input the verification code:$
fingerprint.description: OEM'd Broadcom Router - input validation code

fingerprint.pattern: ^(BCM\d+) Broadband Router\r\nMaximum number of incorrect account entries exceeded.
fingerprint.description: OEM'd Broadcom Router - Max incorrect tries - variant 1

fingerprint.pattern: ^(BCM\d+) Broadband Router\r\nSorry, you need to wait for \d+ second before next login attempt.(?:\r|\n)*
fingerprint.description: OEM'd Broadcom Router - Max incorrect tries - variant 2
